alerts.already_there: You are already at {location}. You have reached your destination.
alerts.path_not_found: You are at {location}. Path not found.
alerts.arrived: You have reached your destination. Thank you for using our app.
alerts.start_navigation: Let's start the navigation with the destination {destination}

instructions.Entrada-Pátio: Go straight from Entrada to Pátio.
instructions.Pátio-Entrada: Go back from Pátio to Entrada.
instructions.Pátio-Corredor 1: Continue straight from Pátio to Corredor 1.
instructions.Corredor 1-Pátio: Go back from Corredor 1 to Pátio.
instructions.Entrada-Corredor 1: Go straight from Entrada, pass through Pátio and continue to Corredor 1.
instructions.Corredor 1-Entrada: Go back from Corredor 1, pass through Pátio and continue to Entrada.
